graph.description: math libraries eigen - http://eigen.tuxfamily.org gsl - http://www.gnu.org/software/gsl/ LAPACK (LINEAR ALGEBRA PACKAGE) - http://www.netlib.org/lapack par/metis - http://glaros.dtc.umn.edu/gkhome/views/metis petsc - http://www.mcs.anl.gov/petsc/petsc-2/index.html scalapack - http://www.netlib.org/scalapack slepc - http://www.grycap.upv.es/slepc/ sprng - http://sprng.cs.fsu.edu/ SuperLU - http://crd.lbl.gov/~xiaoye/SuperLU/ sundials - http://computation.llnl.gov/casc/sundials/main.html
